name: BFF!! Sacrifice Your Friends
description:
Have you ever wanted to jump over the dead bodies of your best friends? With this game, you and a friend can embark on an adventure, climb a tower and make a few sacrifices on your way up.

You will play as a duck and a rabbit, in a local co-op multiplayer. Half a screen is controlled by WASD, and the other by the directional arrows. Your goal is to reach the top of the tower, dodging many types of obstacles and solving puzzles... mainly sacrificing your buddy. Have fun!
